webInterface.title: Web Interface

webInterface.authProviderHint: Login method for web interface access
webInterface.slackClientIdHint: Slack App > Basic Information > App Credentials > Client ID

channels.outlookInfo: Extracts important tasks from inbox and executes them automatically
channels.confluenceInfo: Detects updated pages and saves important content to memory
channels.jiraInfo: Checks assigned issues and executes required tasks automatically
channels.checkHoursHint: Only check pages updated within last N hours

dialogs.uvMessage:
Python package manager (uv) is required.
Would you like to install it automatically?
dialogs.uvInstallSuccess:
uv has been installed successfully.
You can now start the server.
dialogs.uvInstallFailed:
uv installation failed.
Manual install: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
dialogs.updateAvailableMessage:
Version {{version}} is now available.
Download will start in the background.
dialogs.updateReadyMessage:
Version {{version}} has been downloaded.
Would you like to restart now to apply the update?

remoteMcp.info: Add custom Remote MCP servers. Each server will be available as mcp__NAME__* tools.
remoteMcp.name: Server Name
remoteMcp.nameHint: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only (e.g., myserver)
remoteMcp.instructionPlaceholder: Describe when and how to use this MCP
remoteMcp.toolHint: Enter a name to see the tool format

debug.slackMessagesDesc: Send notification messages to Slack when agent errors occur
